about_the_game:
[Game Mode]
The game adopts a 3D perspective of free exploration, presenting players with a vast and fantastical adventure world. Players can choose one of several distinctive characters as a starting point, each with unique initial skills and growth paths. The combat system integrates a variety of gorgeous skill effects, making every battle awe inspiring.

Faced with numerous challenges and powerful bosses, even if the challenge fails, players will be reborn from the mysterious birthplace, and unlocked equipment, skills, and progress will be preserved. At the birthplace, players can freely match their collected weapons and characters, once again opening the door to their inner demons and embarking on new battles.  

————————————————————————————————————————————

Diverse roles with distinct characteristics
The game offers four charming characters for players to choose from: the charming and colorful fox demon, with its agile skills and enchanting power, becomes a dynamic dancer on the battlefield; Brave warriors, wearing heavy armor and wielding sharp blades, vow to defend justice to the death; The Grim Reaper of the Underworld, wielding the power of life and death, reaps the souls of enemies with a cold and ruthless attitude; There is also a mysterious character waiting for players to unlock and explore. Each character comes with unique initial weapons and exclusive skills, providing players with a completely different gaming experience.

Ancient style scene, free exploration
The game scenes blend rich elements of ancient Chinese style, from majestic mountains and rivers to beautiful water towns, from bustling streets to tranquil bamboo forests, every place exudes the charm and mystery of the East. Players can freely explore this vast world and discover hidden treasures and secrets. You can even run lightly on the water surface, feeling the extraordinary freedom and pleasure.

【 Rich weapons, versatile combinations 】
Up to 60 types of weapons are provided in the game for players to choose from and match. These weapons not only have different appearances, but also possess unique attributes and skills. Continuously upgrade weapons in battle to unleash astonishing power. Rare legendary equipment awaits players to unlock and collect, adding more possibilities to battles.

【 Diverse Equipment, Different Effects 】
Each character can equip up to 5 weapons at the same time, and each challenge will produce different effects based on the selected weapons. This means that players can flexibly adjust their equipment combinations according to their own combat style and needs to cope with various challenges. Every time you enter a challenge scene, it will be a brand new adventure and experience.

【 Diverse difficulty levels, unlimited challenges 】
The game offers a variety of difficulty settings ranging from simple to hellish, meeting the challenge needs of different players. Whether you are a novice in the martial arts world or a seasoned warrior, you can find your own challenges and fun here. By constantly challenging themselves, players will achieve immortal accomplishments and glory.

Numerous bosses, challenge upgrade
There are over 20 super bosses in the game, who not only possess powerful abilities and unique skills, but also hide profound stories and backgrounds. While eliminating the monsters, players need to constantly monitor the movements and movements of the boss. When your own strength is enough to challenge them, don't hesitate to charge forward! Every battle with the boss will be a contest of wisdom and courage, as well as a test of the player's strength and willpower.

————————————————————————————————————————————

 [Story Overview]
The story is set in a fantasy world 500 years after the legendary Journey to the West. The group of four who once collected scriptures had achieved complete success and returned to the state of extreme happiness, but unfortunately their scriptures were scattered and coveted by evil forces, leading to chaos in the world. Players will take on the role of a chosen hero by fate, embarking on a sacred journey to search for and retrieve the true scriptures, in order to transform the world and restore peace and order.
As the true scriptures are recovered one by one, players will undergo a physical and mental transformation, ultimately unlocking and facing the ultimate boss. When the ultimate battle comes to an end, the dawn of the new era will illuminate the earth, and players will become legends remembered by future generations.

name: Black Myth:Destiny Man
short_description: 500 years after the Western Heaven Sutra. The four members of the pilgrimage group have all returned to the west. Those scriptures have also been scattered in various places. Nowadays, despite the absence of saints, demons still run rampant.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
